Description:
   Click the button 'Add' on 'Edit the group', an error is thrown out

Steps to reproduce:
  1. new a datasource and a dataset
  2. drag the dataset to the layout
  3. add a group on the table, and in the wiondow 
'Edit the group', click the button 'Add' . Please see the screen shot
